author: Aishwarya Dharni
title: COVID-19 Is Man-Made, Claims French Virologist And Medicine Nobel Laureate Luc Montagnier
description: French virologist and medicine Nobel laureate Luc Montagnier has claimed that SARS-CoV-2, the virus that has attacked the whole world, is “man-made” and is the result of an attempt to manufacture a vaccine against the AIDS virus in a Chinese laboratory.
content: French virologist and medicine Nobel laureate, Luc Montagnier, has claimed that SARS-CoV-2 - the virus that has attacked the whole world is 'man-made' - and is the result of an attempt to manufacture a vaccine against the AIDS virus, in a Chinese laboratory. … [+2025 chars]
